dialogue.speaker: execut0r
dialogue.text: like, I can't believe this is real.

dialogue.speaker: execut0r
dialogue.text: found creds for one of TELCO's external machines

dialogue.speaker: execut0r
dialogue.text: went trashing with nomadic at TELCO HQ

dialogue.speaker: execut0r
dialogue.text: we spent HOURS digging thru garbage, but worth every second

dialogue.speaker: execut0r
dialogue.text: haven't even gone through all of it yet. might be more goodies.

dialogue.speaker: a1rsh1p
dialogue.text: u don't wanna do the honors?

dialogue.speaker: execut0r
dialogue.text: nah, got something even better cooking up ;)

dialogue.speaker: execut0r
dialogue.text: btw, they use something called 'TELNIX'. i guess it's a UNIX variant.

dialogue.speaker: a1rsh1p
dialogue.text: rusty af, tbh. mind giving me a quick refresher?
